entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -25.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 9:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -25.0°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -27.6°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
